woman receiving and displaying money during celebration
group conversing and celebrating under a canopy tent
description: A group of adults in traditional attire are standing and interacting at a festive indoor event under a canopy tent. One woman is holding a handbag and later handles and displays currency notes, while others are engaged in social interaction. The camera moves around the group, capturing their actions and interactions.
